The chairman of the party of Florida: Blaise Ingoglia, gets to appoint 30 out of the 99 delegates, which has been criticized by Donald Trump's campaign as biased against Trump.
Ingoglia recommends the final 15 delegat: s executive board, which includes himself, and they will vote on those delegates at a meeting in Tampa on May 14.
While there is evidence of past support: including campaign donations and endorsements, Ingoglia has not publicly endorsed any candidate in the current presidential race.
